message: I propose we split it 90/10 in my favor.  It's a fair deal, considering you get a small share but at least you get something.
I propose we split it evenly, as both parties should benefit equally from the division.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think a 85/15 split is fair.  Remember, the money is losing value each round, so it's in your best interest to accept this offer.
